comments: Apart from initial term(s), dimension of the space of weight 2n cuspidal newforms for Gamma_0( 3 ).
links: William A. Stein, Dimensions of the spaces S_k^{new}(Gamma_0(N))
William A. Stein, The modular forms database
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 1, 1, 0, -1).
formula: a(n) = 2*floor(n/2) + floor(n/3) - n + 1. Also a(0) = 1 and a(1) = 0, a(n) = a(n-2) + (a(n-1) reduced = (mod 2)). Again, a(0) = 1, a(1) = 0, a(n) = a(n-1) - 1 - (-1)^n - (a(n-2) mod 2). - _Benoit Cloitre_ and _Philippe Deléham_, Jan 17 2004a(n) = a(n-2) + a(n-3) - a(n-5). - _Philippe Deléham_, Sep 14 2006Euler transform of length 8 sequence [ 0, 1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, -1]. - _Michael Somos_, Sep 26 2006G.f.: (1-x^8)/((1-x^2)*(1-x^3)*(1-x^4)). a(n) = a(n-6) + 2. a(-1-n) = -a(n). - _Michael Somos_, Sep 26 2006
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
